testimonials.text: Manfouo thierno is very young but overcomes this by working very hard and learns very fast.

That Manfouo Thierno must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
